import React, {Component} from 'react'; import "./Checkout.scss" import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import userStoreService from './../../common/services/User/UserStoreService'; import userService from "../../common/services/User/UserService"; class Checkout extends Component { state = { shippingDisable: false }; orderSubmit = (event) => { console.log(event.target.phone.value) let body = { phone_number: event.target.phone.value }; userService.shoppingcart_placeorder(JSON.stringify(body)).then((data) => { console.log(data); // console.log(props,"myprops") alert('Order Submit') this.props.history.push('/') }).catch((error) => { alert(error.message); }); event.preventDefault(); }; render() { return (

Check out

Payment & Contact Information

Payment Information and Phone Number

this.orderSubmit(event)}>

Total: ${userStoreService.getTotalPrice()}

); } } export default Checkout;
